name: Silver Fern Backpackers
description:
Welcome to Silver Fern Backpackers!

This relaxed hostel is an 8-minute walk from both the cafes of Karangahape Road and the casino at SkyCity Auckland.


The basic mixed-gender and female-only dorms come with Wi-Fi and shared bathrooms. Private rooms are available; some have en suite facilities.

Amenities include a communal kitchen 2 cafeterias , a 2 TV lounge and a BBQ area, plus a game room . Parking is available on request 

Minimum age is 18 .

There is no key deposit with us! 

Our opening hours are from 9:00am until 09:00pm 7 days a week

Cancellation policy is 48 hours before check in time.  Bookings that are no-shows are charged up to one night's stay.

houseRules.notes:
Thank you for choosing to stay with Silverfern Backpackers! We are excited to host you and provide a comfortable base for your time in Auckland. Please take a moment to review the following important information about your stay.

Reception Hours:Our reception is open daily from 9:00 AM to 09:00 PM. If you are arriving outside these hours, please contact us in advance to make special arrangements.

Check-In:

Check-in is available from 2:00 PM to 09:00 PM. If you arrive earlier, you are welcome to drop off your bags and enjoy our common areas while you wait.

To check in, you will need to present a valid passport or any official photo identification. Please note that the ID must be the original document and not a copy..

Check-Out:

Check-out is between 10:00 AM and 11:00 AM. Please ensure you vacate your room by this time. Late check-outs may be subject to additional fees.

Location and How to Find Us:Silverfern Backpackers is conveniently located at 234 Hobson Street, Auckland CBD, making it easy to explore the city. We are a short 5-minute walk from the iconic Sky Tower and within easy reach of transport hubs. Look for our signage near the corner of Hobson Street and Pitt Street.

Contact Information:If you have any questions before or during your stay, donâ€™t hesitate to get in touch.

Additional Information:

Cancellation and No-Show Policy: Please note that cancellations and no-shows will be charged 100% of the booking amount.

Adults-Only Policy: Silverfern Backpackers is an adults-only property. We do not accommodate children.

Free Amenities: Enjoy free unlimited high-speed WiFi, BBQ facilities, and access to our guest lounge with TV and workout area.

Baggage Storage: We offer luggage storage if you arrive early or need to leave your bags after check-out.

Parking: Limited parking is available. Please inquire in advance if you require a parking space.

House Rules: We strive to maintain a friendly and respectful environment. Please adhere to our house rules, including quiet hours after 10:00 PM and keeping common areas clean.

We look forward to welcoming you to Silverfern Backpackers and hope you have a fantastic stay in Auckland!

Kind regards,
The Silverfern Backpackers Team

categories.category_description: This hostel has begun to introduce practices that result in a positive social and environmental impact, grasping the fundamentals of the Staircase to Sustainability.
